meanings.definition: A highly pleasing or delightful experience.
meanings.sent1: Visiting the theme park was a delice for the children.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful sunset over the ocean was a true delice to behold.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party was a delice for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: Winning the championship was a delice that he would never forget.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh flowers filled the room, creating a delice atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A delicious or delightful food or dish.
meanings.sent1: The chocolate cake was a delice at the party.
meanings.sent2: She savored every bite of the delice dessert.
meanings.sent3: The chef's special pasta dish was a delice for the taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The homemade pie was a delice that melted in your mouth.
meanings.sent5: The bakery's fresh bread was a delice that drew customers from afar.
